Text: Thanks, I have someone in my life who speaks french
How do you install this? There's no Setup or Installation program. What the hell is this? A joke? There is NO setup or any way to run this. Its just a bunch of files!
If you would read some other post or some forums, there are multiple instructions on how to get this to work. Don't just come in here screaming "There is no install file". N00b.

First read this for how to mount the ISOs as virtual drives: http://www.howtogeek.com/howto/windows-vista/mount-an-iso-image-in-windows-vista/ .

Then read this for how to install the languages: http://www.ehow.com/how_6880919_do-language-files-rosetta-stone_.html . 

Depending on the Rosetta Stone install you used it may say the language files are already present but just install them anyways.
